triellipt — Modules

Annotations

Module Description
triellipt.fem Finite-element solver.
triellipt.amr Mesh refinement tools.
triellipt.geom Geometry module.
triellipt.mesher Mesh generation tools.
triellipt.trimesh Triangle mesh object.
triellipt.mshread Reader of Gmsh meshes.
